name: Tunnel Run (itch) (RealABgames)
description:
The rules of the game are simple: go as long as you can without hitting anything. Try to get the best score you can, and place on the leaderboard! Every level is unique, infinite, and randomly generated for unlimited fun!

Best enjoyed in full screen

Log in to save your high scores and appear on the leaderboard!  You just need to enter in an email and password, and you're done.

Controls:

W - turn up

A - turn left

S - turn down

D - turn right

Left Arrow - tilt left

Right Arrow - tilt right
